name: pinepods
tagline: A self-hosted podcast manager for browsing and streaming
description: PinePods is a self-hosted podcast management tool for browsing, organizing, and streaming audio content. It features episode tracking, metadata, and a sleek UI for personal use.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Stream podcast episodes directly in the browser or mobile app without downloading

features.title: Episode Downloads
features.description: Download episodes for offline listening on mobile devices or desktop

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find new podcasts by searching titles, descriptions, and categories

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate accounts for family members with individual subscriptions and history
